QuestData.Title: WANTED: Maa'run's Hoof
QuestData.Description: Posted by: Orrin$B$BA wild talbuk called "Maa'run" wanders the hills southeast of Embaari Village and west of The Draakorium.$B$BMy brother was injured by this foul beast, and now lays in recovery.$B$BFor the safety of all the nearby villages, we must put an end to this vicious, rampaging creature!$B$BA handsome reward will be given to anyone who can bring me his hoof as proof of his demise.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Collect his hoof, collect the reward.
QuestData.CompletionText: My brother, Anduur, gathers wild berries from the hills above our village.$B$BIt was during one of his excursions that he met up with Maa'run.$B$BI demand retribution for his injuries.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, adventurer! We can rest more easily knowing that this beast has been put to its end.
